actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 106-421.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 106-264.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 494.
Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for a land conveyance to the City of Craig, Alaska, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, at such time as Congress appropriates sufficient funds for the Secretary to acquire non-Federal lands within conservation system units on the Tongass National Forest, to convey all Federal interests in specified lands to the City of Craig, Alaska. Requires that such lands conveyed to the City be of equal value to the lands acquired by the Secretary.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act, to provide for a land conveyance to the City of Craig, Alaska, and for other purposes.
A bill to provide for a land conveyance to the City of Craig, Alaska, and for other purposes.
